PC Number Date Chapter Bill Dept
 2021-05042021-06-03,  ,  ,  ,  ,  ,  GAC, 
ActExport and Import Permits Act
SubjectOrder Amending the Export Control List
PrecisOrder amending the EXPORT CONTROL LIST (ECL) in order to eliminate the requirement to update the ECL through an annual regulatory amendment by amending the ECL to include the phrase "as amended from time to time" in reference to both the Guide to Canada's Export Control List and the common control lists.
RegistrationRegistration: SOR/ 2021-0121 Publication Date: 2021-06-23
AttachmentsAttachment
